name: Afterlife (itch) (Mavericks)
description:
The Afterlife is getting on your nerves! You've made up your mind and are going to escape! But wait, is it the end?

<CONTROLS>

UpArrow to go up

DownArrow to go down

<SOFTWARE USED>

Pixlr E PC 

Bosca Ceoil 

Unity 

<DEVELOPER'S NOTE>

Hello everyone! This game isn't perfect, but I'm sure you'll have a fun time playing it.  Feedback is appreciated.  If there's anything you can't figure out, please write your query in the comment section... Anyways, enjoy the game! :)

All project assets are available on my github

https://github.com/MavericksCG/Brackeys-Game-Jam-2021.2
